product_name: KORRESTravel Size Greek Yoghurt Foaming Cream Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackThe best-selling KORRES Greek Yoghurt Foaming Cream Cleanser is a Mediterranean superfood cleanser in a jet-set friendly size. Formulated with pre and probiotic rich real Greek Yoghurt that leaves skin pure and nourished in one cleanse.

Cruelty free. Recyclable packaging.Key IngredientsGreek Yoghurt: NourishesAmaranth Seed: ProtectsSea Water: Locks-in hydrationResearch Results100% said it made skin feel fresh, revitalized and smooth immediately after use.100% saw more moisturized, healthy looking, dewy skin immediately after use.97% saw a reduction in skin redness and improved skin texture immediately after use.Item 2573091How To UseMassage gently into wet skin and rinse off with plenty of water.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Coco-Betaine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Glyceryl Laurate, Sclerotium Gum, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Citric Acid, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Lactic Acid, Lactis Proteinum/Whey Protein/ Prot√©ine Du Lait, Lactobacillus, Lactose, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Maltodextrin, Maris Aqua/Sea Water/ Eau De Mer, Pentylene Glycol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Cocoyl Alaninate, Sodium Phytate, Titanium Dioxide, Yogurt, Yogurt Powder, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: My favorite cleanser!
reviews.comments: This face wash is a godsend, I've been using it for years! When it became more common for skincare companies to include various chemical exfoliants in face washes, moisturizers, and masks without explicitly stating which ones, this face wash was a great, neutral option that didn't clash with other products and cause chemical burns. It also removes makeup better than some face washes specifically marketed for makeup removal!

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: very clean and the biggest thing is it's very concentrated, you need maybe a dime size of product.

reviews.headline: SO GOOD
reviews.comments: this face wash is a must have!!!I have been using this for a few months now and it never dissapoints me!!it stars off creamy like a lotion kind of texture but once you rub it together it turns into a nice foamy cleanser.If you are wondering weather this is actually a good cleanser it definitely is and you should see if it works for you!!! I have oily to combination skinüôÇ

reviews.headline: One of my must-haves
reviews.comments: This has become my go-to facial cleanser which I come back to no matter what other products I try. A small amount builds into a luxurious creamy foam lather that feels so soothing. I have extremely sensitive skin but this does not irritate it one bit and my face feels so soft, smooth, clean after rinsing, with no tightness, dry patches or flakes that other cleansers often give me. I've also noticed it calms down my redness slightly. The tube lasts ages because of the tiny amount you need - honestly if you're using more than a pea size it's too much. The scent is mild but very pleasant; it doesn't smell like Yoghurt like the Korres Superdose face mask if you're wondering. For me this is worth purchasing full price because my skin adores it.

reviews.headline: I keep coming back
reviews.comments: Been using this cleanser since 2018 (i think!) and any time i stray, i come running right back. Gentle foaming cleanser with a probiotic element. If you get red spots on your forehead, this will clear it up 90%. Sometimes struggle with mascara but nothing a double cleanse and some warm water can't work at.

reviews.headline: Must have !
reviews.comments: Giving my honest review !! I personally think is a must have ! The reason im giving it 5 instead of 4 stars is because the only problem i have is my face is a lil tight n dry after the wash , but nun a lil moisturizer cant fix and besides ur supposed to use moisturizer anyways ! I feel like this definitely removes my makeup even tho i use mid natural makeup nun too heavy . I also pair this with a face glove and works perfect .

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: I have very sentive skin this product works great My skin  is softer

reviews.headline: Clears my skin
reviews.comments: I bought a mini set that included this to keep at my boyfriends house & when I was staying at his place consistently, my skin cleared up so much. I recently bought the full size and I've gone from uncontrollable acne to clear skin in a matter of a few weeks. You also dont need much of it and itll take off a full face of makeup. A must have in my routine forever.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Face Wash
reviews.comments: I bought this face wash on sale. It has been the best face wash I have tried. I have acne prone, oily, and dry patches on my skin. This works excellent for all of my issues. Its going to hurt, but I will repurchase at full price because it is that good.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: Was very drying when i first trued it but i didnt think much of it and tried it again a fee days later and i broke out :((( but it did make my skin feel very clean dry but clean

reviews.headline: Don't Judge a Book by its Cover, like I almost did
reviews.comments: A coworker recommended this to me after I told her my trusty Cerave was no longer working for me. My face looked dull and I didn't get that deep clean and moisturizing feeling I initially had. I was skeptical at first of Korres because I have dark brown skin (that I didn't see portrayed on their website) and eczema that is constantly trying to appear on my upper lip. I always give a new product two months to give my skin time to get used to the product before deciding to discontinue. It has now been four months and I am in LOVE. The consistency is just like greek yogurt but its light and refreshing. My face is no longer is dull, its not stripped of its moisture, it is supple, and I feel clean and ready for the rest of my skin care routine. I recommend washing your face with cool/cold water with this product. I feel it works better and it soothes my skin at the same time ;) Especially To all my dark skin girlies, give this product a shot!

reviews.headline: Don't Judge a Book by its Cover, like I almost did
reviews.comments: A coworker recommended this to me after I told her my trusty Cerave was no longer working for me. My face looked dull and I didn't get that deep clean and moisturizing feeling I initially had. I was skeptical at first of Korres because I have dark brown skin (that I didn't see portrayed on their website) and eczema that is constantly trying to appear on my upper lip. I always give a new product two months to give my skin time to get used to the product before deciding to discontinue. It has now been four months and I am in LOVE. The consistency is just like greek yogurt but its light and refreshing. My face is no longer is dull, its not stripped of its moisture, it is supple, and I feel clean and ready for the rest of my skin care routine. I recommend washing your face with cool/cold water with this product. I feel it works better and it soothes my skin at the same time ;) Especially To all my dark skin girlies, give this product a shot!

reviews.headline: GET THIS NOWWW!
reviews.comments: I bought this cleanser during the ulta spring sale and im SO GLAD I did! It true has done wonders for my skin, as someone who has struggled with acne most of my life (i'm 21) this was a game changer. I love that its not too stripping on the skin but does a good job of cleaning the skin. I cannot recommend this enough!

reviews.headline: staple at my house!!!
reviews.comments: we have gone through 3-4 of these in the past year because both my husband and i love it! we have complete different skin types, i have dry skin and he has oily. it is gentle and my skin feels so hydrated after using it!

reviews.headline: Please bring back to stores!
reviews.comments: Love tgis cleanser.  High quality at a very reasonale price.  Please bring it back to stores.

reviews.headline: The best face wash
reviews.comments: I have been using this for like 7/8 years. It's the absolute best. I've tried everything. I have very dry, sensitive skin and this does not dry my skin out at all. Highly recommended.

reviews.headline: Caused break out
reviews.comments: I reeeaallly wanted to like this product, but unfortunately if you have sensitive skin this is most likely not the product for you. I had relatively clear skin, but during the winter i struggle with dry skin so i tried this and i regret it. My skin broke out terribly. Because it can take some time for our skin to adjust to a new product, i continued to use but it just kept getting worse. After a month of this product, when i took it out of my routine my skin started clearing up. This is an expensive product that is definitely a risk if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Favorite cleanser!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser! I've been using it for about 1.5 years, and it does such a great job of removing impurities without stripping my face and leaving my skin dry (I live in Colorado so dry skin is always a challenge). I'd say my skin is somewhat sensitive and prone to redness, and this has never irritated my skin.

reviews.headline: Amazing cleanser!
reviews.comments: This cleanser is hands down the best! It's tough enough to remove makeup, yet gentle for sensitive skin. Leaves skin soft and beautiful!

reviews.headline: Korres Greek Yogurt Cream Cleanser
reviews.comments: Very soft, gentle cleanser and cleans very well. I use it as my second step after oil cleanser. My sister who has very dry and sensitive skin loves this cleanser very much too (unlike her, I have oily skin and loved it too). Would buy again ‚ù§Ô∏è

faceoff_positive.comments: This facial cleanser is AMAZING for my sensitive dry skin. To be honest, I didn't have high hope about this product at first but I'm surprised by how my skin looks after washing this off my face. You know those dry fine lines you get when you smile after you wash a facial wash of your face? That's not what happens with this face wash. For that reason, this has been my go-to facial wash for the dry climates. This creamy-but-not-greasy texture is what you get when you squeeze the product put of the tube. The rest of of the step is your basic lather-and-rinse. Formulated with Greek Yoghurt as the star ingredient, it nourishes the skin as it cleanses it. But the best part of it all is it is SOAP-FREE. I proved it by lathering it all over my eyelids and it did NOT sting at all. Keep in mind that I only tried this as a facial wash, not as a makeup remover. I'm a double-cleanse believer and so I would use a cleansing oil or balm before I clean my face with facial wash the second time. That being said, it is a very good facial cleanser and worth it for the price point of $26 for a 150 mL of product. The product itself has this curdled milk kinda scent, but it's something I'm used to since I use Amlactin lotion that has a similar scent to it (soo moisturizing and nourishing and it has lactic acid that gently exfoliate your skin btw). That might be something to think about though if you're into nice-smelling stuff. For me, the efficacy of the product towers the scent so I give this :star:√î‚àè√®:star:√î‚àè√®:star:√î‚àè√®:star:√î‚àè√® and a half since the scent isn't too overpowering either. *Disclaimer: I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing Product

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product complimentary from Influenster and to be 100% honest, I wasn't impressed by this product. BUT, I also wasn't completely disappointed. Firstly, I'm not one to regularly sit at the sink and wash my face every night so just the directions alone (‚Äö√Ñ√∫Rub gently into wet skin and rinse off with plenty of water.‚Äö√Ñ√π) created a huge mess from me trying wash my face not in the shower. Water. Everywhere. Pro tip: use this in the shower. Things I liked; the fact that this product is soap free. I have somewhat dry skin, and soap tends to make it worse. It also has 86.4% natural ingredients in the product, which means less chemicals in your daily life. Win. I also found the idea of a Greek yoghurt face cleanser very intriguing and was wondering just how it would be to use. Unfortunately for me, I didn't really notice a difference between using this and one of my other face cleansers. The creme was lightly scented and pleasant to put on my face, but when I rinsed it off and sat for a bit my skin felt papery and tight. I was hoping that the Greek yoghurt would be lightly moisturizing. All in all, it's not terrible or even close to it, but it also didn't stand out.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not the best, but also not completely terrible.

rollup.name: Travel Size Greek Yoghurt Foaming Cream Cleanser
